text: I'm a lioness. I have four cubs. I'm a mom. I want to take care of my kids and protect them.
author: Heidi Klum

text: My mom is at my house every day, and she nags me about everything, especially hygiene.
author: Shia LaBeouf

text: I remember driving to North Carolina when I was a little girl in a snowstorm to get down to my mom's family in the Carolinas. There were chains on the car - it was the late sixties - and we were just singing in the car. Christmas carols.
author: Tori Amos

text: When I was little, my mom tells me, I used to say things like, 'Mom do you hear the string section? Do you hear the string section?' And she would look at me and say, 'No honey, I don't know what you're talking about.'
author: Tori Amos

text: Being the only man in the household with my mom definitely helped me grow up fast.
author: LeBron James
